The snoozed or dismissed attribute; for example, the snooze duration.
Docs.summary:
Enables the snoozed or dismissed attribute of a recommendation. The snoozed or dismissed attribute is referred to as a suppression. Use this API to create or update the snoozed or dismissed status of a recommendation.
Request Path/{resourceUri}/providers/Microsoft.Advisor/recommendations/{recommendationId}/suppressions/{name}
Operation IdSuppressions_Create
Default Api Version2020-01-01
Resource
